item.title: February 11, 2025, at 7:46:40â€¯PM
item.description:
I had some fun playing around with 11ty in Glitch today. The only thing that really makes 11ty stand out from a regular static site with HTML and CSS is the ability to use Nunjucks templates.

This means you can make changes to your site by updating the template file, instead of having to manually edit every single file. It saves a lot of time! However, I'm not sure if rebuilding this particular site in 11ty would be worth the effort.
